input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for compositional flow toward the subject — whether leading lines, natural boundaries, tonal contrasts, and environmental geometry guide the viewer's eye naturally toward the cat.

description: Scores how deliberately and effectively a cat photograph is composed. Evaluates whether the cat feels like the intentional focal point of the frame by assessing subject placement and balance, use of surrounding space, and compositional flow toward the subject. Style-agnostic: no rigid rules, only whether the framing serves the cat.

input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for intentional framing — whether the composition feels deliberate and positions the cat as the natural focal point of the image.
